cue cmd dump
cmp stdout expect-stdout
-- f1.cue --
package kube

test: {
    a: 1
}

// A kind at the top-level should not be allowed.

kind: "foo"
$id: "bar"

-- dump_tool.cue --
package kube

import (
	"tool/cli"
	"encoding/yaml"
)

command: dump: {
	task: print: cli.Print & { text: yaml.Marshal(test) }
}

-- expect-stdout --
a: 1
